title: 'Art Of Manliness' Is Finding A Balance Between Tough And Tender
teaser: To help men learn to be better men in the 21st century, Brett MacKay created the website Art of Manliness. He talks with Audie Cornish about what he sees as the basic conflict of modern masculinity.
contentencoded:
To help men learn to be better men in the 21st century, Brett MacKay created the website Art of Manliness. He talks with Audie Cornish about what he sees as the basic conflict of modern masculinity — tough versus tender — and points out that men across time have successfully embraced both.
